About the Company: Malu Paper Mills Limited is an India-based company engaged in manufacturing of paper. The Company is engaged in the manufacture of Kraft Paper and Newsprint. The Company has set up three paper manufacturing units in Nagpur, Central India. As of March 31, 2011, the Company had an installed capacity of 19,800 tons per annum of paper. During the year ended March 31, 2011, the Company produced 12,085.982 metric tons of paper in Unit I; 19,790.405 metric tons of Kraft paper in Unit II, and 25,245.524 metric tons of newsprint and 8,443.757 metric tons of writing and printing in Unit III. The plants are located in Saoner Taluka of Nagpur District. The Company is a flagship company of Malu Group.
